price: 49 Nous avons confié à Moïse les Ecritures afin que son peuple soit guidé.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
